abstract: A food brand with a funny name, which is known for funny advertising, is starting a campaign that offers a humorous look back at eating habits when Dwight and Mamie were in the White House, Dick and Dorothy were on the radio and Ozzie and Harriet were on TV.

headline.main: New Campaign Tries to Butter Up Shoppers
